logger.doc:name: Logger Input
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "correlationId": correlationId, "message": "Received Input for $(flow.name)", "content": vars.originalPayload, "timestamp": now(), "appName": app.name }]

logger.doc:name: Logger Output
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "correlationId": correlationId, "message": "Received Output for $(flow.name)", "content": payload, "httpCode": vars.httpCode, "timestamp": now(), "appName": app.name }]
